sourcesContent:
import { memo, useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { english, vietnamese } from '../../Languages/GeneralInformationTour' import { english as englishCategory, vietnamese as vietnameseCategory } from '../../Languages/TourCategory' import City from '../../Data/city.json' import './GeneralInformationTour.scss' function GeneralInformationTour({ languageSelected, tour, setTour }) { const languageList = (languageSelected === 'EN' ? english : vietnamese) const categorys = (languageSelected === 'EN' ? englishCategory : vietnameseCategory) const handleBlur = (input) => { input.style.border = 'solid 1px #D9D9D9' } const handleFocus = (input) => { input.style.border = 'solid 1px #4874E8' } return (
handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} value={tour.code} onChange={(e) => setTour({ ...tour, code: e.target.value })} className="input-inline" type='text' />
handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} value={tour.name} onChange={(e) => setTour({ ...tour, name: e.target.value })} className="input-inline" type='text' />
handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} value={tour.minAdult} onChange={(e) => setTour({ ...tour, minAdult: e.target.value })} className="input-inline" type='number' min={1} />
handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} value={tour.maxAdult} onChange={(e) => setTour({ ...tour, maxAdult: e.target.value })} className="input-inline" type='number' min={1} />
handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} value={tour.minChildren} onChange={(e) => setTour({ ...tour, minChildren: e.target.value })} className="input-inline" type='number' min={1} />
handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} value={tour.maxChildren} onChange={(e) => setTour({ ...tour, maxChildren: e.target.value })} className="input-inline" type='number' min={1} />
handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} value={tour.minToActive} onChange={(e) => setTour({ ...tour, minToActive: e.target.value })} className="input-inline" type='number' min={1} />
{tour.mode === 1 ?
handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} className="input-inline" type='number' min={1} />
handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} className="input-inline" type='number' min={1} />
:
handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} className="input-inline" type='time' min={1} />
handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} className="input-inline" type='time' min={1} />
}
) } export default memo(GeneralInformationTour)
